metadata.feature_description: Import and export wiki articles for backup or migration

steps.action: Navigated to Wiki module page at http://localhost:8081/en-us/Community/Wiki
steps.actual: Wiki module loaded successfully with 27 articles visible

steps.action: Entered Edit mode by clicking Edit icon in Persona Bar
steps.expected: Page enters edit mode showing module action buttons
steps.actual: Page entered edit mode, module action buttons visible for Wiki modules

steps.action: Clicked on Admin menu for Wiki module (module 433)
steps.expected: Admin menu should show Import Content and Export Content options
steps.actual: Admin menu showed only: Settings, Help, Develop, Delete, Refresh - NO Import/Export Content options

steps.action: Clicked on Edit menu for Wiki module (module 433)
steps.expected: Edit menu should show Import Content and Export Content options
steps.actual: Edit menu showed only: Add Companion Modules... - NO Import/Export Content options

issues: Import/Export Content feature is NOT available in the Wiki module
Module does not implement IPortable interface required for Import/Export functionality
The .dnn manifest only declares Upgradable and Searchable supported features, not Portable
Referenced code file ContentExchangeController.cs does not exist

observations: Code analysis confirms Wiki module does NOT implement IPortable interface
The module's BusinessController class implements ModuleSearchBase and IUpgradeable, but NOT IPortable
The .dnn manifest supportedFeatures section only lists: Upgradable, Searchable - NOT Portable
The file referenced in test prompt (ContentExchangeController.cs) does not exist in the codebase
DNN requires modules to implement IPortable interface and declare Portable as a supportedFeature for Import/Export Content to be available
This feature appears to have been documented but never implemented for the Wiki module
